entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:14 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 41 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 41 this morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 37 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 37 by morning. Wind chill minus 53 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
